meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>collect</kanji> and focus in on the <kanji>middle</kanji>. Really zoom in on it. When you do this, you're concentrating on this spot, thus making the meaning of this word <vocabulary>to concentrate</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to focus</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
